title: Biggest Three Games of the Week, Early-Season Injuries, and the 2019 Rams With Aaron Donald | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
We highlight some of the key injuries from Week 1, workshop some hot takes (5:20), and preview the top matchups in Week 2. Then, we talk about Jon Gruden’s hot start and the Chargers' offensive game plan, and preview 'Thursday Night Football' (27:40). Then the guys chat with Aaron Donald of the Los Angeles Rams about utilizing his size, his team's Super Bowl defeat, Sean McVay’s brilliance, and more (52:45).
Hosts: Robert Mays, Kevin Clark
Guest: Aaron Donald

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
